items.title: Ruben den Uil heeft goals nodig om te slagen voor zijn examen
items.summary: Na een relatief korte winterstop gaat vrijdag de Eredivisie weer verder. Tot diep in maart is er elk weekeinde een speelronde. Met andere woorden: het cruciale deel van het seizoen gaat beginnen. In deze serie maken we bij elke club de balans op, waarbij we wat betreft de volgorde uitgaan van de eerste speelronde van 2026. Deze keer: Excelsior.

items.title: Bliksemontslag: Celtic neemt na acht duels afscheid van trainer
items.summary: Wilfried Nancy claimde zelf dat een ommekeer heel dicht bij was , maar de kans daarop krijgt de trainer van Celtic niet. De Schotse club maakt maandag bekend afscheid te nemen van de Fransman.

items.title: Celtic sack manager Nancy after eight games
items.summary: Celtic sack manager Wilfried Nancy, with Saturday's 3-1 defeat by Rangers his sixth loss in just eight matches, with head of football operations Paul Tisdale also removed from his post.

items.title: 'Duidelijke topkandidaat voor erfenis Amorim bij Man United'
items.summary: In dit blog vind je alle speculaties en bevestigde transfers in het buitenland. Bekijk hier ons blog voor de transferperikelen in Nederland.

items.title: Ruben Amorim sacked by Manchester United and Darren Fletcher takes interim role ‚Äì live
items.summary: Amorim sacked after losing power struggle over transfers Darren Fletcher to take charge for game at Burnley Have any thoughts? Send them to Dom via email 1. Ole Gunnar Solskjaer (2018-2021) ‚Äì 54% win rate The Norwegian started off as a caretaker and his impact was so great that United granted him the full-time job. Undoubtedly the best football of the post-Ferguson era was played under Solskjaer, who preferred his side to counter-attack at speed and enjoyed a sensational record against Manchester City and Pep Guardiola, beating them three times at the Etihad. Came second in the league in 2020-201 but was denied an elusive trophy by the agonising 2021 Europa League final defeat to Villarreal on penalties. Continue reading...

items.title: Celtic sack Nancy after 36 days
items.summary: Wilfried Nancy has been sacked by Celtic after just 36 days in charge.

items.title: Ajax heeft in lege Johan Cruijff Arena geen kind aan Belgische oefentegenstander
Newcastle contact police after Willock receives racist abuse
items.summary: Newcastle United contact the police after midfielder Joe Willock is the subject of "disgusting" racial abuse and "deeply disturbing threats" online.

items.title: Manchester United fan‚Äôs view: ‚ÄòAmorim out was inevitable ‚Ä¶ but I wish club had kept faith‚Äô
items.summary: An Old Trafford season-ticket holder on why the club‚Äôs real problems go far deeper than the departing head coach Well, here we go again. The clown car called Manchester United just tooted its horn, backfired loudly and threw its latest driver out on to Sir Matt Busby Way. Darren Fletcher is now at the wheel, where Ruben, Ole and so many others have been before. A wheel that seems to come off in the hands of those who attempt to grip it. Continue reading...

items.title: Sources: Rosenior in London, close to Chelsea job
items.summary: Chelsea are moving closer to the appointment of Liam Rosenior as their new head coach after the 41-year-old arrived in London on Sunday, sources have told ESPN.

items.title: Amorim out as Man Utd coach after 14 months
items.summary: Ruben Amorim has been sacked by Manchester United from his role as head coach.

items.title: Sources: Utd sacked Amorim after Wilcox row
items.summary: Ruben Amorim was sacked by Manchester United in the aftermath of an explosive meeting with director of football Jason Wilcox on Friday, sources have confirmed to ESPN.

items.title: Bayern wonderkid Karl reveals Real Madrid dream
items.summary: Bayern Munich wonderkid Lennart Karl has revealed that we "definitely" wants to play for Real Madrid at some point in his career, calling the Spanish giants his "dream club."

items.title: Oranje-international Nouwen scheurt maand na rentree opnieuw kruisband
items.summary: In dit blog volgen we alle ontwikkelingen in het vrouwenvoetbal. We besteden onder meer aandacht aan de Eurojackpot Vrouwen Eredivisie, de Europese toernooien en het Nederlands elftal.

items.title: Man United must go big and hire a superstar manager after firing Ruben Amorim
items.summary: It is time for one of the most powerful clubs in the world to hire a manager with the experience, track record, credentials and personality befitting Man United's status.

items.title: Amorim sacked by Man Utd after 14 months in charge
items.summary: Manchester United sack manager Ruben Amorim after he criticised the club's hierarchy following Sunday's 1-1 draw at Leeds.

items.title: Callum Wilson in talks to leave West Ham after five months as Nuno problems mount
items.summary: Striker understood to be dissatisfied with life under Nuno West Ham have signed two strikers this month Callum Wilson is in talks to leave West Ham five months after joining. It is understood the striker has grown dissatisfied with life under Nuno Esp√≠rito Santo and wants a new challenge. Wilson was signed on a cheap incentivised one-year deal and his situation is an apparent sign of wider discontent within the squad over their manager. The Guardian has reported that Nuno, whose side are at increasing risk of relegation from the Premier League, is in danger of losing the dressing room‚Äôs support because of concerns over his tactics and man-management. Continue reading...

items.title: Fury tells Sky: 'My return will be biggest and best event of that time'
items.summary: Tyson Fury has replied to Sky Sports Boxing's Instagram page saying his return to boxing in 2026 will be the "biggest and best event of that time," as he documents his training in Thailand.

items.title: 'Amorim's toxic exit the latest chaotic chapter in Ratcliffe's reign'
items.summary: Ruben Amorim's acrimonious exit is the latest example of Manchester United's chaos and instability under Sir Jim Ratcliffe, says Phil McNulty.

items.title: Who could be the next permanent Man Utd manager?
items.summary: A former Manchester United player? A current Premier League manager? An overseas coach? BBC Sport looks at the possible replacements for Ruben Amorim.
